column1: #Text=Hama says : " They put us in terrible prisons here in the Fire Nation .
#Text=And why did you stay in the Fire Nation ?
#Text=It 's too painful to talk about anymore .
#Text=We lost our mother in a raid .
#Text=" Hama says : " Oh , you poor things .
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't tell you what it means to meet you .
#Text=" Hama says : " I never thought I 'd meet another Southern waterbender .
#Text=I 'd like to teach you what I know so you can carry on the Southern tradition when I 'm gone .
#Text=To learn about my heritage , it would mean everything to me .
